MetadataRelation.description:
MedataRelation is the class that describes a relationship between two or more metadata assets or metadata specifications based on a given relationship type. The role of each endpoint in the relationship is given by an association role. The type of endpoints in the relationship should match the ones as defined in the corresponding association role specification.
 A relationship between entity/ entity specifications may be governed by conditions and rules which are addressed by constraint references in this resource. Constraints for a relationship may include new rules and conditions in addition to those defined for the corresponding association specification

lastUpdateDate.description: The last modified date of this relationship object

role.description: The end point roles of this relationship
